languages.text: "Плеснееды. Изгои. Те, кому нет места даже среди самых ничтожеств. Кто-то таким родился, кого-то выгнали, чтобы заразу не сеять. Бригадир к чану не пускает, блюстители как завидят, норовят пристрелить. Будто мы виноваты, что уродились поганью в поганом месте... Мы — черви в гнилом брюхе этого корабля, корм для хворей".

"Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."
languages.original_text: "Плеснееды. Изгои. Те, кому нет места даже среди самых ничтожеств. Кто-то таким родился, кого-то выгнали, чтобы заразу не сеять. Бригадир к чану не пускает, блюстители как завидят, норовят пристрелить. Будто мы виноваты, что уродились поганью в поганом месте... Мы — черви в гнилом брюхе этого корабля, корм для хворей".

languages.text: «Comedores de moho. Parias. Gente que ni siquiera puede convivir con la peor chusma. Algunos nacieron así, otros fueron expulsados para que no contagiasen a sus vecinos. El capataz no nos deja acercarnos a la cuba, los guardias nos disparan nada más vernos. Como si tuviésemos la culpa haber nacido en un sitio tan terrible... Somos gusanos en la panza podrida de esta nave, carne purulenta pasto de enfermedades».
languages.original_text: "Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."

traits.locale_text: «Comedores de moho. Parias. Gente que ni siquiera puede convivir con la peor chusma. Algunos nacieron así, otros fueron expulsados para que no contagiasen a sus vecinos. El capataz no nos deja acercarnos a la cuba, los guardias nos disparan nada más vernos. Como si tuviésemos la culpa haber nacido en un sitio tan terrible... Somos gusanos en la panza podrida de esta nave, carne purulenta pasto de enfermedades».

languages.text: 「カビ人間。追放者。最下層民にすら居場所のない人々。生まれつきそうだった者もいれば、伝染病を広げないために追い出された者もいる。作業長は私たちを桶に近づけさせないし、エンフォーサーは私たちを見つけ次第射殺しようとする。まるで、たまたまひどい場所に生まれてしまった私たちが悪いかのように。私たちはこの船の腐った腹の虫であり、病気の餌なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."

traits.locale_text: 「カビ人間。追放者。最下層民にすら居場所のない人々。生まれつきそうだった者もいれば、伝染病を広げないために追い出された者もいる。作業長は私たちを桶に近づけさせないし、エンフォーサーは私たちを見つけ次第射殺しようとする。まるで、たまたまひどい場所に生まれてしまった私たちが悪いかのように。私たちはこの船の腐った腹の虫であり、病気の餌なのだ」

languages.text: “我们是弃民，是靠吃霉菌活着的人。哪怕是在最底层的渣滓之中，也没有我们的立足之处。有些人天生就是这个样子，有些人是被赶到这里的，防止传染。工头不准我们靠近那个大缸，执法者见到我们就开枪，就好像我们愿意活在这种粪坑里一样……我们是这艘烂船肚子里的蛔虫，是疾病的养分。”
languages.original_text: "Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."

traits.locale_text: “我们是弃民，是靠吃霉菌活着的人。哪怕是在最底层的渣滓之中，也没有我们的立足之处。有些人天生就是这个样子，有些人是被赶到这里的，防止传染。工头不准我们靠近那个大缸，执法者见到我们就开枪，就好像我们愿意活在这种粪坑里一样……我们是这艘烂船肚子里的蛔虫，是疾病的养分。”

languages.text: "Schimmelfresser. Aussätzige. Gesindel, das selbst in den niedersten Schichten keinen Platz findet. Einige wurden so geboren, andere wurden verstoßen, um eine Verbreitung der Infektion zu verhindern. Der Vorarbeiter lässt uns nicht in die Nähe des Fasses und die Enforcer erschießen uns, sobald sie uns sehen. Als wäre es unsere Schuld, an diesem schrecklichen Orte geboren zu sein ... Wir sind Würmer im verrotteten Bauch dieses Schiffs, Futter für die Krankheit.
languages.original_text: "Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."

traits.locale_text: "Schimmelfresser. Aussätzige. Gesindel, das selbst in den niedersten Schichten keinen Platz findet. Einige wurden so geboren, andere wurden verstoßen, um eine Verbreitung der Infektion zu verhindern. Der Vorarbeiter lässt uns nicht in die Nähe des Fasses und die Enforcer erschießen uns, sobald sie uns sehen. Als wäre es unsere Schuld, an diesem schrecklichen Orte geboren zu sein ... Wir sind Würmer im verrotteten Bauch dieses Schiffs, Futter für die Krankheit.

languages.text: « Des parias condamnés à se nourrir de moisissure. Des gens qu'ont plus leur place nulle part, même pas dans les bas-fonds les plus crasseux. Certains d'entre nous sont nés ainsi, d'autres ont été chassés de peur que leur mal se propage. Le contremaître refuse de nous laisser approcher de la cuve, et les prévôts cherchent à nous abattre à vue. Comme si on avait choisi de naître dans un trou pareil... On est que des asticots grouillants dans les entrailles putrides de ce tas de ferraille, un réservoir de chair pas très fraîche pour toutes sortes de maladies. »
languages.original_text: "Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."

Certains d'entre nous sont nés ainsi, d'autres ont été chassés de peur que leur mal se propage. languages.text: "Küf yiyenleriz. Yurtsuzlarız. En diptekilerin bile altında kendine yer bulamayan halkız. Bazılarımız böyle doğar, bazılarımız da salgının yayılmasını engellemek için sürülür. Ustabaşı bizi tanka yaklaştırmaz. İnfazcılar ise gözlerine iliştiğimiz gibi bizi vurmaya çalışır. Sanki bok gibi bir yerde doğmak bizim hatamız da... Bu geminin çürümüş karnındaki solucanlarız biz, hastalıkları besleriz."
languages.original_text: "Mould-eaters. Outcasts. Folk who have no place even among the lowest of the low. Some were born that way, some were driven out to keep them from spreading the contagion. The Foreman won't let us near the vat, the enforcers try to shoot us on sight. As if it's our fault that we were born in a terrible place... We are worms in the rotten belly of this ship, fodder for disease."
